system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Intermittent errors when processing customer transactions.

conversation_history.message: Hi, we’re experiencing intermittent errors when processing customer transactions. It happens a few times a day.
Thanks for reporting this, Lisa. Can you provide more details about the errors? Are there any error messages or codes displayed?
Yes, we’re seeing a ‘500 Internal Server Error’ on the checkout screen. It usually resolves after refreshing, but it’s disruptive.
Got it. I’ll check the backend logs for any patterns or anomalies during the reported times. Can you confirm if this happens across all users or only specific accounts?
It seems to happen across all users, but I’ll double-check with my team to confirm.
Thanks, Lisa. While I investigate, you may want to advise your team to clear browser cache and cookies as a precaution. I’ll update you once I have more information.
